scripts.dev:site:fr: SITE=pix-pro SITE_DOMAIN=FR PORT=6001 DOMAIN_FR=http://localhost:6001 DOMAIN_ORG=http://localhost:7001 nuxt dev
scripts.dev:site:org: SITE=pix-pro SITE_DOMAIN=ORG PORT=7001 DOMAIN_FR=http://localhost:6001 DOMAIN_ORG=http://localhost:7001 nuxt dev
scripts.generate:fr: npm run generate:prepare && SITE_DOMAIN=FR nuxt generate && cp -R ./.output/public ./build/fr
scripts.generate:org: npm run generate:prepare && SITE_DOMAIN=ORG nuxt generate && cp -R ./.output/public ./build/org
scripts.generate: npm run generate:clean && npm run generate:fr && npm run generate:org
scripts.start:nginx: PORT=80 erb servers.conf.erb > nginx.conf && docker-compose up
